summary:
Experienced, analytical and logical ICT executive sales professional, with extensive expertise gained in different environments with the emphasis on development and the maximization of potential. Exceeded targets consistently in challenging competitive scenarios. Ability to align technology solutions to a customer’s business issues and use ROI and TCO concepts to consistently deliver high margin growth. Demonstrated the ability to make accounts captive and build pipelines in chosen technologies. Ability to lead and motivate teams to cross functionally deliver sales and revenue numbers. Subject matter expert in selling to Service Providers, enterprise and public sector verticals and deep pervasive relationships within all key accounts in market segments. Additionally, built & maintained good relationships with the channel partners and understands changing market requirements. Takes the lead on moving deals through the sales process by knowing how and when to engage the appropriate principal and partner tools and resources. Looking forward to join a progressive organization in order to learn the dynamics and to perform effectively towards the achievements of organizational objectives.

Specialties: Confident in the faculty to handle opportunities within an organization that will result in visible achievement of organizational objectives through effective implementations derived from the underlying strategies. Eager to contribute to the growth of a progressive company with quality products or services by using the attributes of education, communication skills, high level of motivation and practicing the essence of customer service.

school.name: Institiute Of Chartered Accountants Of Pakistan

profile_positions.description: Worked for TNS NIPO performing telephonic research interviewing people regarding changing dynamics and current economic challenges within the European Union.
profile_positions.title: Telephonic Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Worked as an Area Sales manager in the company’s communication (sales & customer operations) department. Primary objectives were to ensure the achievement of company's targets through franchise management, identifying new business opportunities in the market, induction of new franchise outlets, ensuring the availability of company’s products and the awareness of new promotions offered by the company to these retail and customer services support outlets in order to ensure a productive retail distribution channel network by maintaining a close co-ordination between franchise, sales and distribution managers and retail outlets.Marketing new products and policies of the company concerning current and upcoming technologies from the company as well as globally in the market regarding networks and as well as handsets.Contributed developing new call plans and revising existing call plans for regular and Blackberry consumer capacity .Contributed in the SFA handheld project in the year 2009 and further assisted in the successfull launch of SFA handheld device program for the company. Contributed developing new business plans and models and remodelling existing business plans for the company through better feedback and intelligence regarding other Telecom operators.
Managing network issues regarding coverage and co-ordinating with the enginering department to execute a timely resolution to it.
profile_positions.title: Area Manager (Sales and Customer Operations)

profile_positions.description:
Worked as an inside sales account manager (Middle East and Pakistan) for the company. 
Key objectives included promotion of company's products and services performing inside sales functions. Creating business opportunities by identifying customer and entrepeneurs and evaluating their position. Researched and analyzed sales opportunities by understanding the customer's requirements, budgets and their buying habits. Organizing sales appointments with customers and qouting products and services. Selling products by developing relationships with key company personells and recommending products, services and solutions to fill their requirements. Recommending new products to existing customers and providing them better options. Maintaining favourable relationships with current and potential customers. Building and maintaining close relationships with new and existing channel partners.
profile_positions.title: Inside Sales Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Worked for the company in franchise/dealer’s management and sales department. 
Primary and key job objectives were induction of new outlets, association of these outlets and freelancers to the franchise network. Franchise retention policies, sales, documentation, and web relating issues, new quarterly promos by the company for the franchisee and web relating issues etc. Marketing intelligence regarding other operators and connection pricing in the market. Managing Corporate Sales and providing after sales support to corporate as well as individual customers. Network issues regarding coverage in any of the areas are reported to the company’s engineering directly.
Marketing new products and policies of the company through individual consumer awareness program, concerning current and upcoming technologies from the company as well as globally in the market regarding networks and as well as handsets.
Nationwide handsets stock, distribution and their availability and reporting directly to the concerned authorities. Managing distribution of Promotional material in the market. Keeping track of new freelancers and maintaining database of the freelancers that are currently operating in the market and those who are new in the market.
profile_positions.title: Dealer Sales Co-ordinaror

profile_positions.description: Completed an eight weeks internship program and developed branch operating system and employee tracking system for the bank.
profile_positions.title: Internee
